title: How to Post to Flickr Using Photoshop Elements

steps.headline: Open up Adobe Photoshop Elements and process your image or images in it as usual.
Click on 'Share' at the upper right side of the screen.
Click on 'Share to Flickr'.
steps.description: This will bring up a small dialogue box that will tell you that 'Organizer' is loading.

steps.headline: Authorize Flickr.
steps.description: Once your workspace has loaded, Flickr will need to be authorized.

steps.headline: Click 'Ok, I'll Authorize It'.
steps.description: Once you click authorize, you will be taken to a webpage that you can choose to authorize it or not.

steps.headline: Complete the authorization.
steps.description: After you have authorized it on the website, you will need to go back to the program and 'Complete Authorization'. This will take you to the screen where you will choose your images that you wish to upload.

steps.headline: Add more pictures or other media if you choose.
steps.description: Click on the Green plus sign (+) to get to the screen for you to select images to upload.

steps.headline: Click on 'Upload'.
steps.description: Since you have already authorized it, your image (or images) will be uploaded straight to Flickr. After that, you have the option of going to the location or not.

text: Open up Adobe Photoshop Elements and process your image or images in it as usual.  Click on 'Share' at the upper right side of the screen.  Click on 'Share to Flickr'. This will bring up a small dialogue box that will tell you that 'Organizer' is loading. Authorize Flickr. Once your workspace has loaded, Flickr will need to be authorized. Click 'Ok, I'll Authorize It'. Once you click authorize, you will be taken to a webpage that you can choose to authorize it or not. Complete the authorization. After you have authorized it on the website, you will need to go back to the program and 'Complete Authorization'. This will take you to the screen where you will choose your images that you wish to upload. Add more pictures or other media if you choose. Click on the Green plus sign (+) to get to the screen for you to select images to upload. Click on 'Upload'. Since you have already authorized it, your image (or images) will be uploaded straight to Flickr. After that, you have the option of going to the location or not.
